blocks.name: cnvordtrestixx
blocks.content: The restriction of the 'greater than' order to an interval gives the same topology as the subspace topology. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))))
  -| wss(c0, cxr)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr2i(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))), co(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))), co(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0)))
  ordtrest2(s1, s0, hs0, ccnv(cle), c0, cxr, wtru)
  eqtri(cxr, cdm(ccnv(cle)), crn(cle))
  lern()
  df-rn(cle)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(ccnv(cle), ctsr))
  ax-mp(wcel(ccnv(cle), ctsr), wcel(cle, ctsr))
  cnvtsr(cle)
  a1i(wtru, wss(c0, cxr))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)))), c0))
  eqsstrd(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)))), c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rabbidva(hs0, cxr, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))
  adantlr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  brcnvg(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0), cxr, cle)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  simplr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  brcnvg(cv(hs0), cxr, cv(s0), c0, cle)
  ancom(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))
  eqsstr3d(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), c0, co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))
  sseldi(cv(s0), cxr, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sseldi(cv(s1), cxr, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  iccval(hs0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), c0))
  oveq1i(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0, cfv(cordt, cle))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), cfv(cordt, cle)), wcel(cle, cps))
  ax-mp(wcel(cle, cps), wcel(cle, ctsr))
  letsr()
  tsrps(cle)
  ordtcnv(cle)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(cle))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnvordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((ordTop ` ≤)[|`t]c0)=(ordTop `(`' ≤ ⋂(c0 × c0)))
  ⊣ c0 ⊆ ℝ*
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(s0[[,]]s1)⊆ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr2i(((ordTop ` ≤)[|`t]c0), (ordTop `(`' ≤ ⋂(c0 × c0))), ((ordTop ` `' ≤)[|`t]c0))
  mptru((ordTop `(`' ≤ ⋂(c0 × c0)))=((ordTop ` `' ≤)[|`t]c0))
  ordtrest2(s1, s0, hs0, `' ≤, c0, cxr, wtru)
  eqtri(cxr, dom(`' ≤), ran(≤))
  lern()
  df-rn(cle)
  a1i(wtru, `' ≤ ∈ TosetRel)
  ax-mp(`' ≤ ∈ TosetRel, ≤ ∈ TosetRel)
  cnvtsr(cle)
  a1i(wtru, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  adantl(wtru, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s1[`' ≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[`' ≤]s0)} ⊆ c0)
  eqsstrd({ hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s1[`' ≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[`' ≤]s0)}, c0, { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)}, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  rabbidva(hs0, cxr, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s1[`' ≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[`' ≤]s0), (s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1))
  syl6bb(((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ*), (s1[`' ≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[`' ≤]s0), (s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1), (hs0[≤]s1 ∧ s0[≤]hs0))
  anbi12d(((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ*), s1[`' ≤]hs0, hs0[`' ≤]s0, hs0[≤]s1, s0[≤]hs0)
  adantlr(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*, (s1[`' ≤]hs0 ↔ hs0[≤]s1))
  brcnvg(s1, c0, hs0, cxr, cle)
  syl2anc(((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ*), (hs0[`' ≤]s0 ↔ s0[≤]hs0), hs0 ∈ ℝ*, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpr((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℝ*)
  simplr(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*)
  brcnvg(hs0, cxr, s0, c0, cle)
  ancom(hs0[≤]s1, s0[≤]hs0)
  eqsstr3d({ hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)}, c0, (s0[[,]]s1), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0[[,]]s1)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)}, s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ*)
  sseldi(s0, cxr, c0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simpr(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0)
  sseldi(s1, cxr, c0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simpl(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0)
  iccval(hs0, s0, s1)
  ancoms(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0[[,]]s1)⊆ c0)
  oveq1i((ordTop ` `' ≤), crest, c0, (ordTop ` ≤))
  ax-mp((ordTop ` `' ≤)=(ordTop ` ≤), ≤ ∈ PosetRel)
  ax-mp(≤ ∈ PosetRel, ≤ ∈ TosetRel)
  letsr()
  tsrps(cle)
  ordtcnv(cle)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(`' ≤)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
}

blocks.name: prsdm
blocks.content: Domain of the relation of a proset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prsdm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(cdm(c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdm(c1), c2, wcel(c0, cproset))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cdm(c1), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  dmeqi(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  impbid1(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  elind(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  prsref(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0), c2)
  spcev(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  exlimiv(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sseli(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2))
  inss2(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))
  opelxp1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2, c2)
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cproset))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prsdm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Proset → dom(c1)= c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, dom(c1), c2, c0 ∈ Proset)
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ dom(c1), hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ dom(((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))))
  eleq2i(hs0, dom(c1), dom(((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))))
  dmeqi(c1, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  syl6rbbr(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ dom(((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))), hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))))
  impbid1(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))))
  ex(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))))
  syl((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))), < hs0, hs0 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  elind(< hs0, hs0 >, (le ` c0), (c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Proset ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  sylib((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), < hs0, hs0 > ∈(le ` c0), hs0[(le ` c0)]hs0)
  prsref(c0, hs0, c2, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  df-br(hs0, (le ` c0), hs0)
  sylancom(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ c2, < hs0, hs0 > ∈(c2 × c2), hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ c2)
  opelxpi(hs0, c2, hs0, c2)
  spcev(hs1, hs0, < hs0, hs0 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  eleq1d(< hs0, hs1 >, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)), < hs0, hs0 >, hs1 = hs0)
  opeq2(hs1, hs0, hs0)
  exlimiv(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)), hs0 ∈ c2)
  syl(< hs0, hs1 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)), hs0 ∈ c2, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  sseli(< hs0, hs1 >, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)), (c2 × c2))
  inss2((le ` c0), (c2 × c2))
  opelxp1(hs0, hs1, c2, c2)
  eldm2(hs1, hs0, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Proset)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(< hs0, hs0 > ∈((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
}

blocks.name: prsrn
blocks.content: Range of the relation of a proset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm prsrn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(crn(c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, crn(c1), c2, wcel(c0, cproset))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), crn(c1), crn(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  rneqi(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  impbid1(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  elind(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  prsref(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0), c2)
  spcev(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  opeq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  exlimiv(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sseli(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2))
  inss2(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))
  opelxp2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c2, c2)
  elrn2(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c1))

thm prsss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  ineq1i(c3, cxp(c1, c1), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  inass(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1))
  ineq2d(cfv(cple, c0), cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1), wss(c1, c2))
  sylib(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))

  syl6eqel(c1, universe, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)), wss(c1, c2))

  ressle(c1, universe, cfv(cple, c0), co(c0, cress, c1), c0)

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| wceq(c4, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(cfv(cordt, c1), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  syl5eq(cfv(cordt, c1), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))

  eqid(cdm(c1))

  eqid(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))

  fveq2d(cfi, cun(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))), cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, cproset))
  uneq12d(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))), csn(c2), cun(c3, c4), wcel(c0, cproset))

thm ordtprsval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Proset →(ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))
  ⊣ c3 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c1]s0 }))
  ⊣ c4 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c1]s1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Proset →(ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Proset →(ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))))), d(s1, c0))
  syl5eq((ordTop ` c1), (topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))), (topGen `(fi `({ dom(c1)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s1[c1]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s0[c1]s1 })))))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  ax-mp((ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ dom(c1)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s1[c1]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s0[c1]s1 })))))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c1, universe, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  inex1((le ` c0), (c2 × c2))
  fvex(cple, c0)
  ordtval(s0, s1, c1, universe, dom(c1), ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s1[c1]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s0[c1]s1 })))
  eqid(dom(c1))
  eqid(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s1[c1]s0 })))
  eqid(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s0[c1]s1 })))

  fveq2d(cfi, ({ dom(c1)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s1[c1]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c1)| ¬ s0[c1]s1 })))), ({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ Proset)

thm ordtprsuni(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  uneq12d(csn(cdm(c4)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))), csn(c1), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  sneqd(cdm(c4), c1, wcel(c0, cproset))
  uneq12d(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))), c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cdm(c4), c1, wcel(c0, cproset), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))
  biidd(wcel(c0, cproset), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))), c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cdm(c4), c1, wcel(c0, cproset), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))
  biidd(wcel(c0, cproset), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))
  syl5reqr(c1, cuni(cun(csn(cdm(c4)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))))), cdm(c4), wcel(c0, cproset))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(c4), cuni(cun(csn(cdm(c4)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c4, universe))

  inex1(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c1, c1))
  fvex(cple, c0)
  ordtuni(s0, s1, c4, universe, cdm(c4), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))

  eqid(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c4), crab(s1, cdm(c4), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  prsdm(c0, c4, c1)
  unieqd(cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)), cun(csn(c1), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  uneq2d(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(cun(c2, c3), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))))
  uneq12i(c2, c3, crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cproset)
  diff.cproset.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cproset)
  diff.cproset.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c4)

thm ordtprsuni(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Proset → c1 = ⋃({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =((le ` c0)⋂(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c2 = ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))
  ⊣ c3 = ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Proset → c1 = ⋃({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3))), d(s0, c1))
  3eqtr4d(c1, ⋃({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)), ⋃({ dom(c4)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), ⋃({ c1 } ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  unieqd(({ dom(c4)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), ({ c1 } ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  uneq12d({ dom(c4)}, (ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 }))), { c1 }, (ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  sneqd(dom(c4), c1, c0 ∈ Proset)
  uneq12d(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })), ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 })), c0 ∈ Proset)
  rneqd((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }), c0 ∈ Proset)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(c4), { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }, c1, { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }, c0 ∈ Proset)
  rabeqbidv(s1, dom(c4), c1, c0 ∈ Proset, ¬ s1[c4]s0, ¬ s1[c4]s0)
  biidd(c0 ∈ Proset, ¬ s1[c4]s0)
  rneqd((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 }), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }), c0 ∈ Proset)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(c4), { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 }, c1, { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }, c0 ∈ Proset)
  rabeqbidv(s1, dom(c4), c1, c0 ∈ Proset, ¬ s0[c4]s1, ¬ s0[c4]s1)
  biidd(c0 ∈ Proset, ¬ s0[c4]s1)
  syl5reqr(c1, ⋃({ dom(c4)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), dom(c4), c0 ∈ Proset)
  ax-mp(dom(c4)= ⋃({ dom(c4)} ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c4, universe, ((le ` c0)⋂(c1 × c1)))
  inex1((le ` c0), (c1 × c1))
  fvex(cple, c0)
  ordtuni(s0, s1, c4, universe, dom(c4), ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))
  eqid(dom(c4))
  eqid(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s1[c4]s0 })))
  eqid(ran((s0 ∈ dom(c4)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(c4)| ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))
  prsdm(c0, c4, c1)
  unieqd(({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)), ({ c1 } ⋃(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  uneq2d({ c1 }, (c2 ⋃ c3), (ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }))), c0 ∈ Proset)
  a1i(c0 ∈ Proset, (c2 ⋃ c3)=(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 }))))
  uneq12i(c2, c3, ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c4]s1 })))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cproset)
  diff.cproset.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cproset)
  diff.cproset.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c4)

  fveq2d(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))))), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)))))))), cun(csn(c2), cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)))))), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))

blocks.name: ordtrestNEW
blocks.content: The subspace topology of an order topology is in general finer than the topology generated by the restricted order, but we do have inclusion in one direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(ordTop `(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))⊆((ordTop ` c3)[|`t]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))
} = {
  eqsstrd((ordTop `(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))), ((ordTop ` c3)[|`t]c1), (topGen `(fi `({ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))} ⋃(ran((hs0 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))↦ { hs1 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))| ¬ hs1[(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))]hs0 }))⋃ ran((hs0 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))↦ { hs1 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))| ¬ hs0[(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))]hs1 })))))), (c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  mp1i((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (ordTop `(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))=(topGen `(fi `({ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))} ⋃(ran((hs0 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))↦ { hs1 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))| ¬ hs1[(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))]hs0 }))⋃ ran((hs0 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))↦ { hs1 ∈ dom((c3 ⋂(c1 × c1)))| ¬ hs0[(c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))]hs1 })))))), (c3 ⋂(c1 × c1))∈ 𝕌)
  inex1(c3, (c1 × c1))

blocks.name: ordtrest2NEW
blocks.content: An interval-closed set ` A ` in a total order has the same subspace topology as the restricted order topology. (An interval-closed set is the same thing as an open or half-open or closed interval in ` RR ` , but in other sets like ` QQ ` there are interval-closed sets like ` ( _pi , +oo ) i^i QQ ` that are not intervals.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: ordtconnlem1
blocks.content: Connectedness in the order topology of a toset. This is the "easy" direction of ~ ordtconn . See also ~ reconnlem1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtconnlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(co(c3, crest, c1), cconn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cordt, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  con4d(wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c3, crest, c1), cconn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))), wn(wcel(co(c3, crest, c1), cconn)))

  nfan(s2, wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))))
  nfv(s2, wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)))

  nfral(s2, s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))

  diff.wne.s(s1, cin(crab(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s2)))), c1), emptycls)
  diff.cin.s(s1, crab(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s2)))), c1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s2))))
  diff.wn.s(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s2)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, csn(cv(s2))))
  diff.wn.s(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
